headline: Gartner (IT): Rethinking Valuation as Analyst Coverage Highlights AI Risks and Slower Growth
summary: Gartner (IT) just caught investor attention after Wolfe Research initiated coverage of the stock with a neutral stance, highlighting pressures from client budget constraints and rising concerns about AI potentially replacing parts of its core advisory business. This follows Gartner’s latest quarterly update, in which contract value grew just 4.9% compared to last year, signaling uncertainty around near-term demand for the company’s research and consulting services. The market reaction? Shares...
